search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for HelpDesk (helpdesk.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the HelpDesk pricing page is: [https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Team
----

For growing teams with entry-level needs.

$ 29 /mo

per agent billed annually **(save 15%)** or $34 billed monthly

*   Paid users with admin or agent roles
*   Unlimited free viewers
*   5 teams
*   5 forwarding addresses
*   5 reply addresses
*   One custom domain
*   5 email templates
*   5 active rules
*   5 activated custom fields

Business
--------

For businesses with multi-brand operations.

$ 50 /mo

per agent billed annually **(save 15%)** or $59 billed monthly

*   Paid users with admin or agent roles
*   Unlimited free viewers
*   100 teams
*   100 forwarding addresses
*   100 reply addresses
*   100 custom domains
*   100 email templates
*   50 active rules
*   20 activated custom fields

Enterprise
----------

For corporations requiring an individual approach.

Fill form to talk to Sales

![Image 1](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/sqf/decor-left.svg)

individual contract, [learn more](https://www.helpdesk.com/enterprise-help-desk-software/)

*   Everything from the Business plan with no limits
*   Dedicated account manager
*   Product training
*   Software engineer support
*   Security assistance
*   White label

What makes HelpDesk stand out?
------------------------------

See how users value our simple ticket system for everyday tasks.

![Image 2](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/lifebouy.svg)

### 24/7/365 support

Feel free to reach out to us anytime you need support or guidance, no matter what!

![Image 3](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/shield-password.svg)

### Data safety

Make sure you’re secure with GDPR compliance and Privacy-Shield certification.

![Image 4](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/ticket-multichannel-2.svg)

### Extensive marketplace

Seamlessly integrate HelpDesk with other apps and systems to boost your productivity.

How does the free trial work?
-----------------------------

**Try HelpDesk with a free 14-day trial of our Business plan without any commitment.** After your trial, you can choose to continue with the Team plan at $29 per month per agent (billed annually), the Business plan at $50 per month per agent (billed annually), or a tailored Enterprise solution based on your needs. Find the plan that suits you best.

Compare HelpDesk plans
----------------------

Pricing (all prices in USD)

Price / month (billed annually)

Price / month (billed monthly)

Messaging

Multiple inboxes

Manage different company inboxes in one place. ![Image 5: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Manage different company inboxes in one place.

Team reply address

Adjust the email address for outgoing messages to match your brand. ![Image 6: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Adjust the email address for outgoing messages to match your brand.

Multiple email templates

Create multiple email templates for your teams to organize response processes better. ![Image 7: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Create multiple email templates for your teams to organize response processes better.

Contact form

Publish the contact form on your website and get submissions as tickets directly to HelpDesk. ![Image 8: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Publish the contact form on your website and get submissions as tickets directly to HelpDesk.

Recipient details

Get detailed information about your recipients, such as customers, prospects, business partners, employees, vendors, or investors, to improve communication and tailor interactions. ![Image 9: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Get detailed information about your recipients, such as customers, prospects, business partners, employees, vendors, or investors, to improve communication and tailor interactions.

Create custom fields to specify your tickets with additional helpful information for your work.

![Image 13](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Prepare ready-made messages based on your communication best practices and trigger them with a single click.

Leave confidential notes attached to your tickets that will only be visible to you and your team.

Categorize tickets with tags to filter and identify similar cases later.

Prioritize tickets and highlight urgent cases to better organize and plan your work.

Statuses

Use Open, Pending, On hold, Solved, or Closed statuses to stay on top of your tickets.

Merge many requester's tickets into one main ticket.

Verify that the message has been read by the recipient and prepare the next steps.

Grow from feedback and allow your recipients to assess your performance and the quality of your assistance.

Automation

Automated assignment

Automatically assign tickets to appropriate team members and teams. ![Image 25: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Automatically assign tickets to appropriate team members and teams.

Create custom rules according to your requirements.

Use ready-made rule templates to automate any tasks in seconds.

Private macros

Create private macros for personal use only. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions. ![Image 30: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Create private macros for personal use only. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions.

Shared macros

Create shared macros for use by multiple users. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions.

![Image 33](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Use bulk actions to perform ticket-related tasks quicker and on a large scale.

Record your screen using the video response feature in HelpDesk to guide your recipients in solving their issues.

AI

Text enhancements

Extend, correct, or make your text more polite, formal, or casual in seconds.

![Image 37](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Recognize languages instantly and automate ticket routing, responses, and teamwork across multiple languages.

Work management

Multiple teams

Create multiple teams with different goals and daily tasks, such as sales, marketing, customer service, finance, legal, and tech. ![Image 45: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 46](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/user-check.svg) Managers' favorite

Create multiple teams with different goals and daily tasks, such as sales, marketing, customer service, finance, legal, and tech.

Agent and admin roles

Give one of three roles: Admin, Agent, and Viewer. Admins have all the permission, Agents can work with tickets, and Viewers can only browse and read tickets. ![Image 47: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 48](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/lock.svg) Fully secure

Give one of three roles: Admin, Agent, and Viewer. Admins have all the permission, Agents can work with tickets, and Viewers can only browse and read tickets.

![Image 50](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Give Viewer roles to allow browsing and reading of tickets without modification.

Suspending users

Use viewer role for temporarily suspending an agent’s status to pause billing without extra charges.

Become the ticket follower and be notified of any updates in it.

Switching to HelpDesk from other providers is simple
----------------------------------------------------

Migration feels like an effortless upgrade – it's that intuitive!

![Image 120](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/steps/1.662a7f3b8e49b36ac0bff87be2ca4175f0f06b273e393265750543d19593db0b.svg)

Use your existing HelpDesk account or create a new one.

![Image 122](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/steps/3.9beee459af1318b20a915c2aab73b729386cec1f5438a00b6eab59c9e0be7625.svg)

Chat with us to get our support in the migration process, offer information about any related costs and, if possible, cover them for you.

![Image 123: HelpDesk Partner Program](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/helpdesk-partner-program.jpg)

### Opening a HelpDesk account for a client?

Become a Solution Partner and set up clients' accounts in no time directly in the Partner App.

[Go to Partner Program](https://partners.livechat.com/solution-program/?utm_source=helpdesk.com/pricing&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=pricing_agency_section)

Any time you need help, you can count on our Support Heroes. They are strong, they are fast, and they will help you - no matter the time!

Chat with us

good company

![Image 125](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/happy-customers.3abd905fe8d7b8555194b183a241defb71af2e49133597006148afc0b10844a2.png)

![Image 126: Tickets that are created with Shopify, Salesforce, LiveChat, and Messenger](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/help-desk.79e548c3ea5a705be5adc9845f58af6bbde2445c7f29b82d107aa8add6655130.png)

Check out HelpDesk's easy-to-read offer and choose the plan that fits you best. Start your free 14-day trial.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes options for annual and monthly billing with discounts for annual payments. Enterprise tier requires custom pricing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For growing teams with entry-level needs.
features: Paid users with admin or agent roles
Paid users with admin or agent roles

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For corporations requiring an individual approach.
features: Everything from the Business plan with no limits

extracted_content.content:
Team
----

For growing teams with entry-level needs.

$ 29 /mo

per agent billed annually **(save 15%)** or $34 billed monthly

*   Paid users with admin or agent roles
*   Unlimited free viewers
*   5 teams
*   5 forwarding addresses
*   5 reply addresses
*   One custom domain
*   5 email templates
*   5 active rules
*   5 activated custom fields

Business
--------

For businesses with multi-brand operations.

$ 50 /mo

per agent billed annually **(save 15%)** or $59 billed monthly

*   Paid users with admin or agent roles
*   Unlimited free viewers
*   100 teams
*   100 forwarding addresses
*   100 reply addresses
*   100 custom domains
*   100 email templates
*   50 active rules
*   20 activated custom fields

Enterprise
----------

For corporations requiring an individual approach.

Fill form to talk to Sales

![Image 1](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/sqf/decor-left.svg)

individual contract, [learn more](https://www.helpdesk.com/enterprise-help-desk-software/)

*   Everything from the Business plan with no limits
*   Dedicated account manager
*   Product training
*   Software engineer support
*   Security assistance
*   White label

What makes HelpDesk stand out?
------------------------------

See how users value our simple ticket system for everyday tasks.

![Image 2](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/lifebouy.svg)

### 24/7/365 support

Feel free to reach out to us anytime you need support or guidance, no matter what!

![Image 3](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/shield-password.svg)

### Data safety

Make sure you’re secure with GDPR compliance and Privacy-Shield certification.

![Image 4](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/drawn/active/ticket-multichannel-2.svg)

### Extensive marketplace

Seamlessly integrate HelpDesk with other apps and systems to boost your productivity.

How does the free trial work?
-----------------------------

**Try HelpDesk with a free 14-day trial of our Business plan without any commitment.** After your trial, you can choose to continue with the Team plan at $29 per month per agent (billed annually), the Business plan at $50 per month per agent (billed annually), or a tailored Enterprise solution based on your needs. Find the plan that suits you best.

Compare HelpDesk plans
----------------------

Pricing (all prices in USD)

Price / month (billed annually)

Price / month (billed monthly)

Messaging

Multiple inboxes

Manage different company inboxes in one place. ![Image 5: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Manage different company inboxes in one place.

Team reply address

Adjust the email address for outgoing messages to match your brand. ![Image 6: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Adjust the email address for outgoing messages to match your brand.

Multiple email templates

Create multiple email templates for your teams to organize response processes better. ![Image 7: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Create multiple email templates for your teams to organize response processes better.

Contact form

Publish the contact form on your website and get submissions as tickets directly to HelpDesk. ![Image 8: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Publish the contact form on your website and get submissions as tickets directly to HelpDesk.

Recipient details

Get detailed information about your recipients, such as customers, prospects, business partners, employees, vendors, or investors, to improve communication and tailor interactions. ![Image 9: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Get detailed information about your recipients, such as customers, prospects, business partners, employees, vendors, or investors, to improve communication and tailor interactions.

Activated custom fields

Create custom fields to specify your tickets with additional helpful information for your work. ![Image 10: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 11](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/database.svg) Data collection

Create custom fields to specify your tickets with additional helpful information for your work.

Canned responses

Prepare ready-made messages based on your communication best practices and trigger them with a single click. ![Image 12: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 13](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Prepare ready-made messages based on your communication best practices and trigger them with a single click.

Private notes

Leave confidential notes attached to your tickets that will only be visible to you and your team. ![Image 14: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 15](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/circles.svg) Loved by teams

Leave confidential notes attached to your tickets that will only be visible to you and your team.

Tags

Categorize tickets with tags to filter and identify similar cases later. ![Image 16: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Categorize tickets with tags to filter and identify similar cases later.

Priorities

Prioritize tickets and highlight urgent cases to better organize and plan your work. ![Image 17: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Prioritize tickets and highlight urgent cases to better organize and plan your work.

Statuses

Use Open, Pending, On hold, Solved, or Closed statuses to stay on top of your tickets. ![Image 18: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use Open, Pending, On hold, Solved, or Closed statuses to stay on top of your tickets.

File sharing

Share files with team members or recipients without leaving the HelpDesk app. ![Image 19: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Share files with team members or recipients without leaving the HelpDesk app.

Ticket merging

Merge many requester's tickets into one main ticket. ![Image 20: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 21](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/route.svg) Organized ticketing

Merge many requester's tickets into one main ticket.

Message delivery tracking

Verify that the message has been read by the recipient and prepare the next steps. ![Image 22: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Verify that the message has been read by the recipient and prepare the next steps.

Agent rating

Grow from feedback and allow your recipients to assess your performance and the quality of your assistance. ![Image 23: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 24](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/smile.svg) Customer feedback

Grow from feedback and allow your recipients to assess your performance and the quality of your assistance.

Automation

Automated assignment

Automatically assign tickets to appropriate team members and teams. ![Image 25: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Automatically assign tickets to appropriate team members and teams.

Custom active rules

Create custom rules according to your requirements. ![Image 26: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 27](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/user-check.svg) Managers' favorite

Create custom rules according to your requirements.

Preset rules

Use ready-made rule templates to automate any tasks in seconds. ![Image 28: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 29](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/pig-money.svg) Money saver

Use ready-made rule templates to automate any tasks in seconds.

Private macros

Create private macros for personal use only. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions. ![Image 30: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Create private macros for personal use only. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions.

Shared macros

Create shared macros for use by multiple users. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions. ![Image 31: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Create shared macros for use by multiple users. Then, apply them and update a ticket with a pre-set series of actions.

Bulk actions

Use bulk actions to perform ticket-related tasks quicker and on a large scale. ![Image 32: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 33](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Use bulk actions to perform ticket-related tasks quicker and on a large scale.

Screen recording

Record your screen using the video response feature in HelpDesk to guide your recipients in solving their issues. ![Image 34: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Record your screen using the video response feature in HelpDesk to guide your recipients in solving their issues.

AI

Text enhancements

Extend, correct, or make your text more polite, formal, or casual in seconds. ![Image 35: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Extend, correct, or make your text more polite, formal, or casual in seconds.

Ticket summary

Use the ticket summary feature to automatically generate a brief and information-rich overview of the ticket and its conversation history. ![Image 36: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 37](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Use the ticket summary feature to automatically generate a brief and information-rich overview of the ticket and its conversation history.

Language detection

Recognize languages instantly and automate ticket routing, responses, and teamwork across multiple languages. ![Image 38: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Recognize languages instantly and automate ticket routing, responses, and teamwork across multiple languages.

Reply suggestions

Quick, context-aware responses powered by AI to streamline ticket replies. ![Image 39: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 40](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/coming-soon.svg) Coming soon

Quick, context-aware responses powered by AI to streamline ticket replies.

Similar ticket suggestions

Automatically find and display past tickets related to the current case for quick resolutions. ![Image 41: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 42](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/star-unfilled.svg) New feature

Automatically find and display past tickets related to the current case for quick resolutions.

Tag suggestions

Get recommendations on relevant tags for tickets to improve your organizational and search capabilities. ![Image 43: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 44](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/star-unfilled.svg) New feature

Get recommendations on relevant tags for tickets to improve your organizational and search capabilities.

Work management

Multiple teams

Create multiple teams with different goals and daily tasks, such as sales, marketing, customer service, finance, legal, and tech. ![Image 45: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 46](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/user-check.svg) Managers' favorite

Create multiple teams with different goals and daily tasks, such as sales, marketing, customer service, finance, legal, and tech.

Agent and admin roles

Give one of three roles: Admin, Agent, and Viewer. Admins have all the permission, Agents can work with tickets, and Viewers can only browse and read tickets. ![Image 47: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 48](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/lock.svg) Fully secure

Give one of three roles: Admin, Agent, and Viewer. Admins have all the permission, Agents can work with tickets, and Viewers can only browse and read tickets.

Free viewer role

Give Viewer roles to allow browsing and reading of tickets without modification. ![Image 49: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 50](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Give Viewer roles to allow browsing and reading of tickets without modification.

Suspending users

Use viewer role for temporarily suspending an agent’s status to pause billing without extra charges. ![Image 51: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use viewer role for temporarily suspending an agent’s status to pause billing without extra charges.

Collaboration

Agent mentioning

Mention an agent or admin in a private note who can assist you in solving the ticket. ![Image 52: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Mention an agent or admin in a private note who can assist you in solving the ticket.

Ticket following

Become the ticket follower and be notified of any updates in it. ![Image 53: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Become the ticket follower and be notified of any updates in it.

Collision detection

Detect key activities performed in a ticket, such as browsing or typing by another agent. ![Image 54: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 55](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/circles.svg) Loved by teams

Detect key activities performed in a ticket, such as browsing or typing by another agent.

Shared ticket views

Share ticket views with your team to work on them together. ![Image 56: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Share ticket views with your team to work on them together.

Allowed domains

Allow teammates to join Text products without invitations by setting up allowed domains. ![Image 57: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Allow teammates to join Text products without invitations by setting up allowed domains.

Customization

Agent signatures

Add your own signature to messages sent from HelpDesk. ![Image 58: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Add your own signature to messages sent from HelpDesk.

Visual email template builder

Freely customize email templates for each team using a no-code visual builder. Create different looks for the messages sent to recipients. ![Image 59: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 60](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/drag-drop.svg) No code feature

Freely customize email templates for each team using a no-code visual builder. Create different looks for the messages sent to recipients.

Custom domains

Add one or more custom domains and send messages from HelpDesk using your own email address. ![Image 61: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Add one or more custom domains and send messages from HelpDesk using your own email address.

Custom reply address

Adjust the email address for your outgoing messages to match your brand. ![Image 62: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Adjust the email address for your outgoing messages to match your brand.

Customizable ticket views

Save filtering settings as ticket views for easy access on a daily basis. ![Image 63: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 64](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/trending-up.svg) Work booster

Save filtering settings as ticket views for easy access on a daily basis.

Customizable message rating

Ask recipients for feedback with a simple message sent automatically. ![Image 65: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Ask recipients for feedback with a simple message sent automatically.

Customizable automated reply

Automate responses by adding ticket confirmations or other updates to keep recipients informed and improve satisfaction without manual effort. ![Image 66: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 67](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/rotate-clockwise-2.svg) Time saver

Automate responses by adding ticket confirmations or other updates to keep recipients informed and improve satisfaction without manual effort.

Dark mode

Switch to a dark-themed interface for reduced eye strain and a sleek look during low-light or late hours. ![Image 68: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Switch to a dark-themed interface for reduced eye strain and a sleek look during low-light or late hours.

White label

Remove the "This email is delivered by HelpDesk" branding. Available on demand. ![Image 69: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Remove the "This email is delivered by HelpDesk" branding. Available on demand.

Performance and reports

Last 7 days

Review ticket activity over the past 7 days. ![Image 70: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Review ticket activity over the past 7 days.

New tickets

Learn more about new tickets that reach HelpDesk. ![Image 71: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Learn more about new tickets that reach HelpDesk.

New tickets heatmap in last 7 days

Discover peak times with more tickets than usual. ![Image 72: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Discover peak times with more tickets than usual.

Tickets sources

Compare the number of manually created tickets to those from other channels. ![Image 73: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Compare the number of manually created tickets to those from other channels.

Ticket satisfaction

Verify how well recipients rate your assistance. ![Image 74: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Verify how well recipients rate your assistance.

First response time

Find out how quickly you respond to tickets on average. ![Image 75: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 76](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/user-check.svg) Managers' favorite

Find out how quickly you respond to tickets on average.

Resolution time

Learn the average time since a ticket's creation and since an agent started working on it. ![Image 77: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Learn the average time since a ticket's creation and since an agent started working on it.

Handling time by status

Break down the time tickets spend across statuses. ![Image 78: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Break down the time tickets spend across statuses.

Solved and closed

Compare the number of solved and closed tickets. ![Image 79: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Compare the number of solved and closed tickets.

Teams performance

Compare how different teams are performing. ![Image 80: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 81](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/heart-rate-monitor.svg) Detailed data

Compare how different teams are performing.

Agents performance

Compare how different agents are performing. ![Image 82: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Compare how different agents are performing.

Reports export

Export ticket metadata within the specified date range. ![Image 83: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Export ticket metadata within the specified date range.

Security

256-bit SSL secure connection

Keep you data safe with the SSL encryption protocol. ![Image 84: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Keep you data safe with the SSL encryption protocol.

Built-in antispam protection

Get advanced spam prevention mechanisms with an explanation of why the message was marked as spam. ![Image 85: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 86](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/barrier-block.svg) Spam blocker

Get advanced spam prevention mechanisms with an explanation of why the message was marked as spam.

Log in with Google

Use your Google Account details to log in to HelpDesk. ![Image 87: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use your Google Account details to log in to HelpDesk.

Custom SSO

Configure Custom SSO in the Enterprise plan to align with your security protocols. ![Image 88: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Configure Custom SSO in the Enterprise plan to align with your security protocols.

Two-Factor Authentication

Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) to enhance account security by requiring a password and an authentication app code. ![Image 89: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) to enhance account security by requiring a password and an authentication app code.

Log in with Microsoft

Use your Microsoft Account details to log in to HelpDesk. ![Image 90: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use your Microsoft Account details to log in to HelpDesk.

Log in with Apple

Use your Apple Account details to log in to HelpDesk. ![Image 91: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use your Apple Account details to log in to HelpDesk.

Audit log

Get a list of changes made in the app settings. ![Image 92: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 93](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/star-unfilled.svg) New feature

Get a list of changes made in the app settings.

Security assistance

Get tailored security advice from our specialists. ![Image 94: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Get tailored security advice from our specialists.

Product support

Self-service help center

Read step-by-step articles on all HelpDesk features. ![Image 95: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Read step-by-step articles on all HelpDesk features.

24/7/365 support

Connect with our support team on chat to get instant assistance. ![Image 96: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 97](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/brand-wechat.svg) Proactive support

Connect with our support team on chat to get instant assistance.

Product training

Get a one-on-one product training session with one of our Support Heroes. ![Image 98: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 99](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/users.svg) End-to-end training

Get a one-on-one product training session with one of our Support Heroes.

Software engineer support

Talk to our tech team to get support even on the most complicated issues. ![Image 100: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Talk to our tech team to get support even on the most complicated issues.

Legal assistance

Get help from our legal team to analyze or prepare the documentation needed to start using HelpDesk. ![Image 101: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Get help from our legal team to analyze or prepare the documentation needed to start using HelpDesk.

Yearly PO & invoicing

Purchase orders to pay for HelpDesk, and get annual invoices. ![Image 102: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Purchase orders to pay for HelpDesk, and get annual invoices.

Key Account Manager

Get premium support and one-on-one product training sessions. ![Image 103: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Get premium support and one-on-one product training sessions.

Alternative payment terms

As an alternative to using your company card, you can pay for HelpDesk with purchase orders and annual invoices. ![Image 104: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

As an alternative to using your company card, you can pay for HelpDesk with purchase orders and annual invoices.

Pay with crypto

Use cryptocurrencies like USDC on Ethereum, Solana, or Polygon to purchase your HelpDesk license. ![Image 105: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use cryptocurrencies like USDC on Ethereum, Solana, or Polygon to purchase your HelpDesk license.

Maintenance

Archive, Spam, and Trash folders

Use the Archive, Trash, and Spam folders to categorize and organize your tickets. ![Image 106: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Use the Archive, Trash, and Spam folders to categorize and organize your tickets.

Ticket history

Review the ticket history to learn more about the context of the messages. ![Image 107: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 108](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/cloud-data-connection.svg) CRM capability

Review the ticket history to learn more about the context of the messages.

Record storage

Store screen recordings prepared for recipients securely for 30 days. ![Image 109: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Store screen recordings prepared for recipients securely for 30 days.

Custom data retention period

Specify a custom retention period to control data retention time, ensuring compliance with the organization's policies and regulations. ![Image 110: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Specify a custom retention period to control data retention time, ensuring compliance with the organization's policies and regulations.

Integrations

Data migration

Migrate data from another ticketing system with our support, including cost details and possible coverage. If you’re interested, please contact us through chat. ![Image 111: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Migrate data from another ticketing system with our support, including cost details and possible coverage. If you’re interested, please contact us through chat.

API

Customize HelpDesk to meet your needs and improve performance with personalized integrations and API services. ![Image 112: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Customize HelpDesk to meet your needs and improve performance with personalized integrations and API services.

Marketplace apps

Browse marketplace apps and extend your HelpDesk freely. ![Image 113: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Browse marketplace apps and extend your HelpDesk freely.

LiveChat

Connect HelpDesk with your LiveChat account. ![Image 114: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Connect HelpDesk with your LiveChat account.

Zapier

Connect HelpDesk with 3000+ web apps with Zapier. ![Image 115: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Connect HelpDesk with 3000+ web apps with Zapier.

Shopify

Integrate Shopify with HelpDesk to sync order details and communication history, making ticket creation seamless and providing real-time updates. ![Image 116: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Integrate Shopify with HelpDesk to sync order details and communication history, making ticket creation seamless and providing real-time updates.

WordPress

Embed the HelpDesk contact form into your WordPress website as another ticket source. ![Image 117: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

Embed the HelpDesk contact form into your WordPress website as another ticket source.

Webflow

Create a Webflow contact form and forward all submitted forms to HelpDesk. ![Image 118: ?](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/bold/question-circle.svg)

![Image 119](https://www.helpdesk.com/pricing/star-unfilled.svg) New feature

Create a Webflow contact form and forward all submitted forms to HelpDesk.

Switching to HelpDesk from other providers is simple
----------------------------------------------------

Migration feels like an effortless upgrade – it's that intuitive!

![Image 120](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/steps/1.662a7f3b8e49b36ac0bff87be2ca4175f0f06b273e393265750543d19593db0b.svg)

Use your existing HelpDesk account or create a new one.

![Image 121](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/steps/2.31253ce384e5c5a9e83375beb92e4a6d545cc47e461ad91565817226649d50a5.svg)

Specify the data you want to move from another ticketing system.

![Image 122](https://www.helpdesk.com/icons/steps/3.9beee459af1318b20a915c2aab73b729386cec1f5438a00b6eab59c9e0be7625.svg)

Chat with us to get our support in the migration process, offer information about any related costs and, if possible, cover them for you.

![Image 123: HelpDesk Partner Program](https://www.helpdesk.com/images/helpdesk-partner-program.jpg)

### Opening a HelpDesk account for a client?

Become a Solution Partner and set up clients' accounts in no time directly in the Partner App.
